title: The Newton mini-films
creator_credit: Yellow Ball Workshop and Newton Creative Arts Center
brief_description: A selection of animated short films made by children of the Newton Creastive Arts Center supported by their instructors, Yvonne Andersen and Joanne Ricca. Titles include: “A Day in the life of a space scout”, a music video called “Run, run, run!” and “The Frog or The Stupendous titanic struggle between good and bad”.
